nodes.text: Tryla was a female Ming Po who lived on Carlac during the Clone Wars. She was the granddaughter of her people's chieftain, Pieter.

Tryla first appeared in the Clone Wars episode, "A Friend in Need," voiced by Catherine Taber, who had previously voiced Padmé Amidala and Numa in the same series. The Databank entry for Tryla on StarWars.com lists her height as 1.67 meters, but the 2021 reference book Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Character Encyclopedia - Join the Battle! by Jason Fry lists her height as 1.7 meters. This article assumes the latter is accurate as the more recent source.
